function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Influence of fear of authorities on compliance with pandemic measures","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Deployment of iot tools may lead to privacy concerns due to data collection","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of training and education on pandemic preparedness and infection control","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Neglecting the impact of low relative humidity on disease transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 within construction sites","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reluctance to adopt protective behaviors","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"No relation for severity of deterrence with compliance","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Air recirculation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate wastewater treatment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic recovery","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Guidelines on social distancing","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate resources and support for public housing residents during lockdown","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Accessibility","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Use of bioaerosol samplers in crowded public spaces to monitor respiratory viruses","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of privacy in apartments","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High residential density may lead to increased transmission of contagious diseases within the neighborhood","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact on workforce and economy","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Highly infective disease with a range of symptoms, including respiratory failure or death","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic climate is unfavorable for innovation","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privacy interference","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate education and training","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission through tears","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of increased government intervention in markets and private life due to the response to the pandemic, leading to potential disruptions in economic and institutional capacities.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Differences in influenza incidence versus meteorological conditions findings","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poorly controlled tourism development","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of infectious disease transmission to frontline healthcare workers","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shortage of supplies","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Residents in buildings with high exterior glazing reporting higher thermal discomfort and health issues","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient herd immunity to protect the population during a second epidemic wave","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate policy and law formulation in urban planning due to lack of consideration for digital fluency and digital rich environments","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global impact of covid-19 pandemic","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate natural ventilation leading to increased risk of risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Food and nutrition security threat","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission via fomites","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased risk of virus transmission due to long supply paths","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on energy simulation
